name: It is April 1st
description:
If I learned one thing from Elden Ring's release, people like games with big maps.  I've followed this conclusion to its logical next step, and now I present to you a game theoretically 4 times as fun as Elden Ring.

Exploration, secrets to find, hours of gameplay, map 4x as big as Elden Ring's and therefore probably 4x as fun.  Pretty sure on that.  I think.  Probably, yeah.

Happy April Fool's Day.

I'll probably delete this in a few days.
